name: SARTHI (Social Action for Rural & Tribal In-Habitants of India)
briefDescription: SARTHI is working for rural and tribal community in Panchamahals, Dahod, Sabarkantha,Vadodara, Tapi and Dang district of Gujarat and adjoining district of Dungarpur of Rajasthan in the field of Natural Resource Management, Holistic health and women empoerment.
